UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Cm-p5: an antifungal hydrophilic peptide derived from the coastal mollusk Cenchritis muricatus (Gastropoda: Littorinidae).
Literature.Author: López-Abarrategui C, McBeth C, Mandal SM, Sun ZJ, Heffron G, Alba-Menéndez A, Migliolo L, Reyes-Acosta O, García-Villarino M, Nolasco DO, Falcão R, Cherobim MD, Dias SC, Brandt W, Wessjohann L, Starnbach M, Franco OL, Otero-González AJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Candida albicans 01U(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans 38U(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis(MIC=256µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans L26(MIC=128µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans L30(MIC=>256µg/ml),Trichophyton mentagrophytes(MIC=>256µg/ml),Trichophyton rubrum(MIC=32µg/ml)
